hero.title: Skip the website. Give your prices a page and QR code
hero.subtitle: For salons, freelancers, cafés and small businesses that just need a clean price page. Add your services and prices, get a link and QR code, and let clients see your prices on their device.

features.block1Body: Configure plans, add-ons and rules without touching code.
features.block2Body: Send a link or embed on your site. Works great on mobile.
features.block3Body: Colors, copy and structure fully under your control.

home.title: Tierless — One-page pricing calculators
home.description: Create a beautiful pricing page without a website. Share a link or embed it anywhere.

phase1.subtitle: Create price lists and service catalogs in minutes. Share via link or QR code. Update anytime.

step1.label: Simple Setup
step1.title: Add your services.
step1.subtitle: We handle the rest.
step1.desc: Just type in your services and prices. We'll automatically create a beautiful, mobile-friendly page that works for you.

step2.label: Your Style
step2.title: Pick a theme.
step2.subtitle: Look professional instantly.
step2.desc: Choose a style that fits your brand. Colors, fonts, and layout adapt automatically. No design skills needed.

step3.label: Go Live
step3.title: Share anywhere.
step3.subtitle: Works on any phone.
step3.desc: Your page loads instantly on any device. Share via link, QR code, or add to your social bio. Update anytime.

phase3benefits.title: Everything you need. Nothing you don't.

noWebsite.title: No Website Needed
noWebsite.desc: Skip the expensive website. Get a professional page in minutes, not months.

anyPhone.title: Works on Any Phone
anyPhone.desc: Clients just scan and see your prices. No app download, no registration.

updateAnytime.title: Update Anytime
updateAnytime.desc: Change prices, add items, update photos. Instantly. No extra cost.

shareEverywhere.title: Share Everywhere
shareEverywhere.desc: Link, QR code, Instagram bio, WhatsApp status. Your choice.

calculator.title: Built-in Calculator
calculator.desc: Clients pick services and see the total automatically. Perfect for quotes.

multiLanguage.title: Any Language
multiLanguage.desc: Create your page in the language your clients actually use.

step1.title: Scan the QR.
step1.desc: Put it anywhere. No app download needed.

hero.subtitle: Create interactive price lists and calculators in minutes. Share via link or QR code. Update anytime, instantly.

why.title: Why businesses choose Tierless
why.subtitle: Skip the website. Get a professional price page in minutes.
why.no_website_desc: Get a professional online presence without building a full website.
why.mobile_desc: Your pages look great on all phones, tablets, and desktops.
why.update_desc: Change prices anytime. Your page updates in real-time.
why.qr_desc: Print your QR code on flyers, menus, or business cards.
why.calculator_desc: Build dynamic pricing that guides customers to the right choice.
why.analytics_desc: See who viewed your prices and which services are popular.

showcase.editor_desc: No code required. Just add your services and prices, pick a style, and you're live.
showcase.easy_embed_desc: Embed it on your website in seconds.
showcase.brand_desc: Customize colors, fonts, and style to match your business perfectly.

qr.title: Scan. View. Done.
qr.subtitle: Your customers scan a QR code and instantly see your prices on their phone.
qr.step1_desc: Put it on your menu, flyer, business card, or storefront window.
qr.step2_desc: They point their phone camera at the code. No app needed.
qr.step3_desc: Your beautiful price page loads in their browser. Ready to book.

final_cta.subtitle: It only takes a few minutes to get started.

usecases.subtitle: From restaurants to salons, dentists to photographers — create a professional price list for your business.

aiscan.subtitle: Forget manual typing. Just snap a photo of your menu, and our AI extracts all items and prices automatically.

footer.desc: Create beautiful pricing pages and service catalogs without code.
